articles.title: Asian Stocks Set for Declines as Selloff Deepens: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: A global selloff in stocks extended into a fourth day as investors, concerned about lofty tech valuations, shifted away from riskier assets in the run-up to Nvidia Corp.’s earnings and a key US jobs report later this week.
